com.example.healthtracker

Class NotificationsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.healthtracker.Contollers.NotificationsController

  • public class NotificationsController
extends java.lang.Object
    NotificationController handles alerting a Patient of when they should add another record to one of their problems based on the notifications added to problems by the Patient.
    Since:
    2018-10-20

    • Method Detail

      • NotificationsController

        public void NotificationsController(java.sql.Date startDate,
                                    java.sql.Time time,
                                    java.lang.String repeatType)
        Constructor for NotificationController that establishes the frequency and time of the alert.
        Parameters:
        startDate - When the repeating notification will begin.
        time - When the user will be alerted.
        repeatType - How often the user will be alerted.

      • getStartDate

        public java.sql.Date getStartDate()
        Get the startDate of the notification.
        Returns:
        A date indicating when the repeating notification will start

      • getTime

        public java.sql.Time getTime()
        Get the time that the notification is inteded to alert the patient.
        Returns:
        A Time indicating what time of day the notification will send an alert to the patient's device.

      • getRepeatType

        public java.lang.String getRepeatType()
        Get the type of repeating frequency associated with the notification.
        Returns:
        A string indicating how frequently the notification alerts the patient

      • setStartDate

        public void setStartDate(java.sql.Date newDate)
        Set the start date of the notification
        Parameters:
        newDate - The date that the notification should begin sending the patient alerts.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(java.sql.Time newTime)
        Set the time at which the patient is notified.
        Parameters:
        newTime - A Time object indicating what time of day the user is notified.

      • setRepeatType

        public void setRepeatType(java.lang.String newRepeatType)
        Set a new repeat type for the notification.
        Parameters:
        newRepeatType - A string indicating the frequency with which this notification will notify the patient.

      • turnOff

        public void turnOff()
        Turn the notification off so that no alerts are sent to the patient.

      • turnOn

        public void turnOn()
        Turn the notification on so that the patient will be notified based on the Time, StartDate, and RepeatType of the notification.

      • notificationStatus

        public java.lang.Boolean notificationStatus()
        Indicates whether the notification has been dismissed.
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if a notification is up or false after a notification is dismissed.
